# AstroNvim Configuration

## üõ†Ô∏è Installation

#### Clone AstroNvim

```shell
git clone https://github.com/AstroNvim/AstroNvim ~/.config/nvim
```

#### Clone the configuration

```shell
git clone https://github.com/nisavid/astronvim-config ~/.config/nvim/lua/user
```

#### Start Neovim

```shell
nvim
```
